resources.string: Items in this list represent what will be displayed on the watch. Changes made here will be in effect the next time you open the app on your watch
Add a new item by clicking the add button and selecting which currencies to exchange
Remove an item from the list by clicking on it then clicking the delete button
Select the exchanges you want shown by clicking on an item then using the checkboxes to select exchanges
Items will appear in the same row on the watch as they do in this list. You can change the order by clicking and dragging them in this list
